definition: The religious belief system and cultural practice centered around the teachings and life of Jesus Christ, typically involving worship, rituals, and moral principles. It is commonly used to refer to the religion followed by a significant portion of the global population.

examples.german: Das Christentum ist eine monotheistische Religion.
Im Christentum spielt Jesus Christus eine zentrale Rolle.
examples.english: Jesus Christ plays a central role in Christianity.

examples.german: Das Christentum hat weltweit über zwei Milliarden Anhänger.
examples.english: Christianity has over two billion followers worldwide.

examples.german: Im Christentum gibt es verschiedene Konfessionen wie katholisch, evangelisch und orthodox.
examples.english: Christianity has different denominations such as Catholic, Protestant, and Orthodox.

examples.german: Das Christentum basiert auf den Lehren und dem Leben Jesu Christi.
examples.english: Christianity is based on the teachings and life of Jesus Christ.
